attributes.action: give up the idea that perpetual economic growth is the only answer to everything.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Does anyone else think that it is completely obvious that the concept of perpetual growth and consumerism (given where we are after only approximately 100 years of it) can be anything other than a SHORT-TERM engine of mutual benefit and that in the medium to long term it is quite clearly a catastrophically poor way to proceed?
